title: Maybelline Lash Sensational Mascara - Full Fan Effect Mascara - Black - 9.5ml
description: Get voluminous and defined lashes with Maybelline Lash Sensational Mascara. This full fan effect mascara features a unique fanning brush with ten layers of bristles to capture and coat every lash. Launched in 2015, the formula includes conditioning oils and pigments for soft, flexible lashes with all-day wear. Perfect for both everyday use and special occasions, this mascara delivers bold and beautiful lashes with a single coat.
key_features: Full fan effect with ten layers of bristles for voluminous lashes
Formulated with conditioning oils for soft, flexible lashes
Suitable for everyday wear or special occasions
Available in a classic black shade for bold eye looks
meta_title: Maybelline Lash Sensational Mascara - Full Fan Effect Mascara - Black - 9.5ml
meta_description: Buy Maybelline Lash Sensational Mascara - full fan effect mascara for voluminous lashes. Unique fanning brush with conditioning oils for soft, flexible lashes in a classic black shade.

title: Maybelline Lash Sensational Mascara - Full Fan Effect Mascara - Waterproof - Black - 9.5ml
description: Achieve voluminous lashes with Maybelline Lash Sensational Mascara in Waterproof Black. This mascara offers a full fan effect with its innovative fanning brush and conditioning formula. Launched in 2015, it provides bold and defined lashes that last all day. The waterproof formula ensures your lashes stay beautiful through all kinds of weather. Perfect for creating dramatic eye looks for any occasion.
key_features: Waterproof formula for all-day wear in any weather
Full fan effect with ten layers of bristles for voluminous lashes
Conditioning oils for soft and flexible lashes
Bold black shade for dramatic eye looks
